com.iplanet.am.sdk

Class AMDirectoryAccessFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMDirectoryAccessFactory
  • Deprecated. 
    As of Sun Java System Access Manager 7.1.

    public class AMDirectoryAccessFactory
extends Object
    A Factory which provides access to the Directory Services. This Class provides API's to return the appropriate implementation classes for configured packages (viz., ldap or remote).
